Text:
to mods: this is a crack for gta eflc uploaded by another user, mbb15, with a .reg file along with it for the install. to work with 64-bit systems you had to edit the .reg file slightly in notepad.
So i thought id do it for people but i forgot to edit a part off the .reg file so it wont work.

im very very sorry for the inconvenience and my dumb mistake.

OK, my son.....

You're forgiven.

Say 100,000 hail Mary's and buy a homeless person a burger and a bottle of vodka.
